links.description: Samuraiantiqueworld.com has a large inventory of authentic antique Edo period samurai items including antique and replica samurai armor, samurai chainmail and armor clothing, samurai and ninja style weapons, WW2 Japanese swords.

links.title: Brick McBurly, Jidai-geki Legend And Chick Magnet
links.description: The OFFICIAL website of the west's most notorious low budget actor and man about town in Kyoto. The Brickster blends Japanese traditional culture, the world of chanbara, and the exciting nightlife of Japan's biggest citites into...well, something. We're not sure what, but it probably won't get you deported, so go check it out.
